${ModID}:LoseThornsPower.NAME: Lose Thorns
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, lose #b%d layers of #yThorns.

${ModID}:SealPower.NAME: Seal
DESCRIPTIONS: Unable to unleash #yExalt. Lasts #b%d turn(s).

${ModID}:BarrierPower.NAME: Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: Negate the next #b%d active attack damage(s) received.

${ModID}:TmpBarrierPower.NAME: Temporary Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: Negate the next #b%d active attack damage(s) received this round.

${ModID}:TraumaPower.NAME: Trauma
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time a "#yStrike" card is played, add #b2
"#yWound" cards on top of the draw pile.

${ModID}:PosseTwicePower.NAME: Dual Posse
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b%d #yPosse released by consuming #yKeyflare will take effect twice.

${ModID}:OnlyUnlimitedPosseTwicePower.NAME: Dual Posse
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b%d #yPosse released without consuming #yKeyflare will take effect twice.

${ModID}:NegentropyPower.NAME: Negentropy
DESCRIPTIONS: With #b%d stacks of #yNegentropy, using a card with #yLoop effect consumes #b%d stacks of #yNegentropy and trigger the #yLoop effect. #yNegentropy can be stacked up to #b%d and will be carried over to the next battle.

${ModID}:ElationPower.NAME: Elation
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases Base Damage, Base #pPoison, Base #bThorns, Base #yTentacle #yDamage by #b%d%%. Lasts #b%d turn(s).

${ModID}:EnhancePower.NAME: Enhance
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases all active damage dealt by #b%d%%. Lasts #b%d turn(s).

${ModID}:DelayAliemusPower.NAME: Delayed Aliemus
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the next turn, gain #b%d #yAliemus.

${ModID}:DelayEnhancePower.NAME: Delayed Enhance
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the next turn, gain #b%d stack(s) of #yEnhance.

${ModID}:FirstDoctrinePower.NAME: First Doctrine
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing a card, gain #b%d [E] . Up to #b%d times per turn. #b%d remaining.

${ModID}:FleshDetachedPower.NAME: Flesh Detached
DESCRIPTIONS: When perform healing, gain #b%d #yBlock.

${ModID}:BattleThirstPower.NAME: Battle Thirst
DESCRIPTIONS: The number of times #yCommand #yCards deal damage increases by #b%d.

${ModID}:KnightsZealPower.NAME: Knight's Zeal
DESCRIPTIONS: After each #b%d #yCommand #yCard is played, gain #b%d Strength. #b%d more card(s) need.

${ModID}:EntropyUndonePower.NAME: Entropy Undone
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d #yKeyflare after playing a #yCommand #yCard, up to #b%d times per turn. #b%d remaining. When a card with #yLoop effect is played but not triggered, gain #b%d stack(s) of #yNegentropy.

${ModID}:SoulblightPower.NAME: Soulblight
DESCRIPTIONS: At turn ends, heal #b%d HP and gain #b%d #yAliemus. NL #pStance #pof #pThe #pEnd: No longer heal HP, instead trigger !M!%% #pPoison on all enemies.

${ModID}:DrowningInSorrowPower.NAME: Drowning in Sorrow
DESCRIPTIONS: After turn starts, apply #b%d #pPoison to all creatures, then gain #yAliemus equal to #b%d times the number of #pPoison stacks on yourself. You can #yblock #pPoison damage.

${ModID}:GiveAndTakePower.NAME: Give and Take
DESCRIPTIONS: After each active attack, gain #b%d #yThorns.

${ModID}:OutstandingVeteranPower.NAME: Outstanding Veteran
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage of #yStrike increases with #b%d time(s) of the current #yBlock.

${ModID}:RewindingTimePower.NAME: Rewinding Time
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing a #yCommand #yCard, return it to your hand from the Discard Pile, This effect can only trigger #b%d times per turn. #b%d remaining.

${ModID}:ManikinOfOblivionPower.NAME: Manikin of Oblivion
DESCRIPTIONS: Base #yAliemus, Base #pPoison, and Base HP healing effects are increased by #b%d%%. NL After unleashing #yExalt, gain #yAliemus equal to #b%d%% of the #yAliemus consumed.

${ModID}:HandOfOblivionPower.NAME: Hand of Oblivion
DESCRIPTIONS: Base #yStrike Damage #b+%d%%.
